leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算系统生物学与动力学生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: ODE/PDE 模型, 代谢网络, 信号通路, 参数与不确定性
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→参数估计→仿真→敏感性/UQ→反演→验证
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 建模语言/仿真器 + 参数估计/UQ + 数据拟合工作流

unit.unit_name: ODE/PDE 仿真与动力学求解器生态

tools.name: GalerkinSparseGrids.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Grid Discretization with Discontinuous Galerkin Method for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing sparse grid discretization using the Discontinuous Galerkin Method for solving partial differential equations.

tools.name: jaxkineticmodel
tools.one_line_profile: Systems biology modeling and simulation using JAX/Diffrax
tools.detailed_description: A library for building, simulating, and training kinetic models in systems biology, leveraging JAX and Diffrax for differentiability and performance.

tools.name: XPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks framework
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework implementing Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks (XPINNs) for solving nonlinear partial differential equations using domain decomposition.

tools.name: rssn
tools.one_line_profile: Rust-native scientific computing library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source project building high-performance, safe, Rust-native alternatives to scientific computing libraries like NumPy/SciPy.

tools.name: pyquad
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for GSL integration library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, parallel Python wrapper for the GNU Scientific Library (GSL) numerical integration routines.

tools.name: eqsolver
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for equation solving and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for numerical equation solving, optimization, and integration.

tools.name: TemporalGillespieAlgorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the temporal Gillespie algorithm
tools.detailed_description: C++ code implementing the temporal Gillespie algorithm for stochastic simulation of chemical kinetics.

tools.name: exponax
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solvers in JAX
tools.detailed_description: Efficient and differentiable n-dimensional PDE solvers implemented in JAX.

tools.name: pycotools
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for COPASI
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for interacting with COPASI, a software application for simulation and analysis of biochemical networks.

tools.name: pycotools3
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for COPASI (v3)
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for COPASI, facilitating the manipulation and simulation of biochemical models.

tools.name: Arrhenius.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Reacting Flow Modeling Software
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable software package for modeling reacting flows, suitable for combustion and chemical kinetics.

tools.name: StiffNeuralODE
tools.one_line_profile: Stiff Neural Ordinary Differential Equations solver
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Stiff Neural Ordinary Differential Equations, designed to handle stiff dynamics in neural ODE models.

tools.name: Dedalus
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible framework for solving PDEs with spectral methods
tools.detailed_description: A flexible framework for solving partial differential equations using modern spectral methods, written in Python.

tools.name: torchdyn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for neural differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library dedicated to neural differential equations, implicit models, and related numerical methods.

tools.name: Num_Func
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical analysis toolbox for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A numerical analysis toolbox including interpolation, fitting, numerical integration, and ODE solvers.

tools.name: pinn-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for solving differential equations on top of PyTorch, implementing Physics-Informed Neural Networks.

tools.name: quadrature
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Numerical Integration in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for fast numerical integration (quadrature).

tools.name: Massively-Parallel-GPU-ODE-Solver
tools.one_line_profile: GPU accelerated ODE integrator
tools.detailed_description: A GPU accelerated integrator for solving large numbers of independent ordinary differential equation systems.

tools.name: forestclaw
tools.one_line_profile: Quadtree/octree adaptive PDE solver
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, adaptive multi-block solver for partial differential equations on quadtree/octree grids.

tools.name: FourierFlows.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Pseudospectral PDE solvers on periodic domains
tools.detailed_description: Tools for building fast, hackable, pseudospectral partial differential equation solvers on periodic domains in Julia.

tools.name: diffraxtra
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Diffrax ODE solver
tools.detailed_description: A library providing extras for Diffrax, including OOP interfaces and vectorization support.

tools.name: RPNN_for_Stiff_ODEs
tools.one_line_profile: Physics Informed Random Projection Neural Network for Stiff ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A solver implementation using Physics Informed Random Projection Neural Networks for solving Stiff ODEs and DAEs.

tools.name: JAX-DIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interfacial PDE solver
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable PDE solver implemented in JAX, specifically designed for interfacial problems.

tools.name: graphGalerkin
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed graph neural Galerkin networks for PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework for solving PDE-governed forward and inverse problems using physics-informed graph neural Galerkin networks, combining geometric deep learning with classical Galerkin methods.

tools.name: PhyGeoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Geometry-Adaptive CNNs for Parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A physics-informed geometry-adaptive convolutional neural network framework designed to solve parametric partial differential equations on irregular domains.

tools.name: Cuba
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multidimensional numerical integration
tools.detailed_description: A library containing four algorithms for multidimensional numerical integration, widely used in physics for computing Feynman diagrams and other complex integrals.

tools.name: scipy_dae
tools.one_line_profile: Python solvers for differential algebraic equations (DAEs)
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of solvers for differential algebraic equations (DAEs), intended to extend the capabilities of the SciPy ecosystem.

tools.name: GeometricIntegrators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric numerical integration library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for geometric numerical integration of differential equations, preserving physical properties like energy and momentum.

tools.name: MeshIntegrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration over geometry domains in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing numerical integration routines specifically designed for geometry domains defined by Meshes.jl.

tools.name: NumericalIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Basic numerical integration routines for presampled data
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library offering basic numerical integration methods (like Trapezoidal, Simpson's) for integrating presampled data vectors.

tools.name: QuadGK.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive 1D numerical Gauss–Kronrod integration
tools.detailed_description: A pure Julia implementation of adaptive 1D numerical integration using Gauss-Kronrod rules, suitable for high-accuracy integration tasks.

tools.name: Measurements.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Error propagation calculator and library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for physical measurements that supports error propagation, arbitrary precision calculations, and operations with arrays and numerical integration involving uncertainty.

tools.name: CodePDE
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-driven PDE Solver Generation Framework
tools.detailed_description: An inference framework that leverages Large Language Models to generate solvers for Partial Differential Equations, facilitating automated scientific computing.

tools.name: Gen-FVGN-steady
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based PDE solver without pre-computed data
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based solver for steady-state Partial Differential Equations that operates without the need for pre-computed training data.

tools.name: pyvipr
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization widget for systems biology models
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter widget for dynamic and static visualization of systems biology models written in PySB, BNGL, and SBML formats, aiding in model debugging and communication.

tools.name: DPM-Solver
tools.one_line_profile: Fast ODE Solver for Diffusion Probabilistic Models
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated high-order ODE solver designed to speed up the sampling process of diffusion probabilistic models, reducing the number of steps required for generation.

tools.name: DAS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep adaptive sampling for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A deep adaptive sampling method designed to solve high-dimensional partial differential equations efficiently using neural networks.

tools.name: scikit-sundae
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings to SUNDIALS DAE solvers
tools.detailed_description: Python bindings for the SUNDIALS suite of differential-algebraic equation solvers, developed by NREL.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network library for solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library based on PyTorch for solving ordinary and partial differential equations using neural networks, supporting various boundary conditions.

tools.name: NeuroTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Biologically based dynamics for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating biologically plausible dynamics into machine learning models, providing tools for neuroscience-inspired deep learning.

tools.name: NumbaQuadpack
tools.one_line_profile: Numba-compatible wrapper for Quadpack integration
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for Quadpack numerical integration routines that can be called from within Numba-compiled functions for high performance.

tools.name: numbalsoda
tools.one_line_profile: Numba-compatible wrapper for LSODA ODE solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the LSODA ODE solver that allows defining the system of equations in Numba for faster execution.

tools.name: OpFlow
tools.one_line_profile: EDSL for PDE solver composing
tools.detailed_description: An Embedded Domain Specific Language (EDSL) designed for composing and generating PDE solvers efficiently.

tools.name: CompEcon
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for economics and numerical methods
tools.detailed_description: A set of MATLAB functions for solving problems in economics and finance, including general solvers for ODEs, optimization, and numerical integration.

tools.name: PHOENIX
tools.one_line_profile: Biologically informed NeuralODEs for regulatory dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A tool to infer biologically informed Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (NeuralODEs) that describe genome-wide regulatory dynamics.

tools.name: PyBioNetGen
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for BioNetGen
tools.detailed_description: A simple command-line interface and Python wrapper for the BioNetGen rule-based modeling framework.

tools.name: BioNetGen
tools.one_line_profile: Rule-based modeling framework
tools.detailed_description: A software for the specification and simulation of rule-based models of biochemical systems, particularly useful for signal transduction networks.

tools.name: accelerInt
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated ODE solvers for chemical kinetics
tools.detailed_description: A library of tested and verified ODE solvers optimized for chemical kinetics simulations, utilizing CUDA for GPU acceleration.

tools.name: FractionalCalculus.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical fractional calculus computing in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing comprehensive and high-precision numerical methods for fractional calculus computing.

tools.name: FractionalDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Fractional Differential Equations solver
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for solving Fractional Differential Equations (FDEs) using high-performance numerical methods.

tools.name: Catalyst.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction network interface for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language and library for defining chemical reaction networks and systems biology models, integrating seamlessly with the SciML ecosystem for high-performance simulation.

tools.name: DASSL.jl
tools.one_line_profile: DAE solver using BDF method
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of the DASSL algorithm for solving stiff differential algebraic equations (DAE) using variable stepsize backwards differentiation formulas.

tools.name: DelayDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Delay differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library of solvers for delay differential equations (DDEs), including neutral and retarded types, within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqApproxFun.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral PDE discretizations for SciML
tools.detailed_description: Tools for bridging ApproxFun.jl and DifferentialEquations.jl to enable pseudospectral partial differential equation discretizations.

tools.name: DiffEqBase.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Base library for SciML differential equations
tools.detailed_description: The core library defining shared types and interfaces for the DifferentialEquations.jl and SciML ecosystem, facilitating interoperability between solvers and models.

tools.name: DiffEqCallbacks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Callbacks for SciML differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library providing various callbacks (e.g., event handling, saving, modifying state) to augment the functionality of differential equation solvers in the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqFinancial.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Financial models for SciML
tools.detailed_description: A library providing problem specifications and solvers for common financial differential equation models (e.g., Heston, Black-Scholes) within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqGPU.jl
tools.one_line_profile: GPU acceleration for SciML solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling GPU acceleration for DifferentialEquations.jl solvers, allowing for massive parallelism in ensemble simulations and solving large systems.

tools.name: DiffEqOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Linear operators for discretizations of differential equations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing linear operators for discretizations of differential equations, serving as a core component for scientific machine learning (SciML) and numerical solving of PDEs.

tools.name: DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive differential equation solver suite for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A feature-rich library for solving differential equations in Julia, including ODEs, SDEs, DAEs, DDEs, and more. It serves as the backbone for the SciML ecosystem, offering high performance and integration with machine learning.

tools.name: HighDimPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for high-dimensional PDEs using Deep BSDE and Feynman-Kac methods
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to solve high-dimensional partial differential equations (PDEs) using neural network-based methods like Deep BSDE, overcoming the curse of dimensionality.

tools.name: Integrals.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unified interface for numerical integration in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A common interface for quadrature and numerical integration within the SciML ecosystem, supporting various integration methods and backends.

tools.name: MethodOfLines.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Finite Difference PDE solving via Method of Lines
tools.detailed_description: A library that automates the transformation of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) into Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) using the Finite Difference Method (FDM), facilitating solution via ODE solvers.

tools.name: ModelingToolkit.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Acausal modeling framework for scientific machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A modeling framework for high-performance symbolic-numeric computation, allowing for automated transformation, simplification, and parallelization of differential equation models.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) solvers for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving Partial Differential Equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), integrating deep learning with scientific simulation.

tools.name: ODE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Legacy basic ODE solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A collection of basic Ordinary Differential Equation solvers. While largely deprecated in favor of DifferentialEquations.jl, it remains a historical component of the ecosystem.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance ODE and DAE solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: The core library providing high-performance solvers for Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) and Differential-Algebraic Equations (DAEs) within the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: PyDSTool.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the Python PyDSTool library
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper allowing Julia users to access the functionality of the Python PyDSTool library for dynamical systems modeling and simulation.

tools.name: ReactionNetworkImporters.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Importers for biological reaction network formats
tools.detailed_description: Provides functionality to import reaction network models from various formats (e.g., BioNetGen) into the Julia Catalyst.jl/SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: SteadyStateDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for steady-state differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library dedicated to finding steady-state solutions for differential equations, integrating with the broader SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: StochasticDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solvers for stochastic differential equations (SDEs)
tools.detailed_description: Provides robust and high-performance solvers for Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs), supporting both Ito and Stratonovich interpretations.

tools.name: Sundials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to the Sundials solver suite
tools.detailed_description: A Julia wrapper for the SUNDIALS (SUite of Nonlinear and DIfferential/ALgebraic equation Solvers) C library, providing access to CVODE, IDA, and KINSOL.

tools.name: SymbolicNumericIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic-numeric methods for solving integrals
tools.detailed_description: A library combining symbolic and numeric techniques to solve difficult integration problems, enhancing the capabilities of scientific modeling workflows.

tools.name: deSolveDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for R's deSolve package
tools.detailed_description: Allows Julia users to utilize the differential equation solvers from the R package 'deSolve' within the SciML interface.

tools.name: diffeqpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides a bridge to the Julia DifferentialEquations.jl library, allowing Python users to leverage high-performance Julia solvers.

tools.name: diffeqr
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the Julia DifferentialEquations.jl library, enabling R users to access advanced differential equation solvers.

tools.name: numericalnim
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical methods library for Nim
tools.detailed_description: A collection of numerical methods implemented in the Nim programming language, including integration, optimization, and ODE solvers.

tools.name: SpatialPy
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial deterministic/stochastic reaction-diffusion simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for simulating spatial reaction-diffusion-advection problems, supporting both deterministic and stochastic methods within a particle-based fluid dynamics domain.

tools.name: StochKit
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible stochastic simulation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolkit for stochastic simulation of chemical reaction networks, implementing the Gillespie algorithm and various optimized variants.

tools.name: iFeature
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for protein/peptide sequence feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolkit for generating numerical feature representations from protein or peptide sequences, including feature clustering, selection, and dimensionality reduction algorithms.

tools.name: URDME
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic reaction-diffusion simulation on unstructured meshes
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based framework for stochastic reaction-diffusion simulations on unstructured meshes, suitable for modeling spatial biological processes.

tools.name: VoronoiFVM.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Volume Method solver for multiphysics PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for solving systems of nonlinear multiphysics partial differential equations using the Voronoi Finite Volume Method.

tools.name: extensisq
tools.one_line_profile: Extension for scipy.integrate with additional IVP methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that extends scipy.integrate with various additional methods for solving initial value problems (IVP), including implicit and symplectic solvers.

tools.name: odeintw
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for scipy.integrate.odeint for complex/matrix equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around scipy.integrate.odeint that enables the handling of complex-valued and matrix differential equations.

tools.name: CCMATH
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive mathematics library in C
tools.detailed_description: A C library containing functions for linear algebra, numerical integration, curve fitting, and simulation generation, suitable for building scientific applications.

tools.name: IncompressibleNavierStokes.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Incompressible Navier-Stokes solver in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia solver for the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations, suitable for fluid dynamics simulations.

tools.name: PyDEns
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network framework for solving ODEs and PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for solving Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations using neural networks, enabling mesh-free simulation.

tools.name: FBPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks for PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for solving forward and inverse problems related to partial differential equations (PDEs) using finite basis physics-informed neural networks (FBPINNs), offering improved scalability for multiscale problems.

tools.name: pycvodes
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the SUNDIALS CVodes solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around the cvodes solver from the SUNDIALS library, providing efficient numerical integration for ordinary differential equations (ODEs) with sensitivity analysis capabilities.

tools.name: pyodesys
tools.one_line_profile: Straightforward numerical integration of ODE systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a unified interface for numerical integration of systems of ordinary differential equations, supporting symbolic representation and multiple backend solvers.

tools.name: torchphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving partial differential equations
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library based on PyTorch that implements various deep learning methods for solving partial differential equations (PDEs), including PINNs and other neural operator approaches.

tools.name: cerebrum
tools.one_line_profile: Biologically Plausible Neural Networks simulator
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for simulating brain dynamics and inferring connectivity using biologically plausible neural networks, suitable for computational neuroscience and systems biology modeling.

tools.name: ImplicitAD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint differentiation for implicit solvers in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library that automates steady and unsteady adjoints for general solvers and ODEs, enabling forward and reverse mode algorithmic differentiation around implicit functions.

tools.name: CasADi
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic framework for numeric optimization and automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A powerful symbolic framework for numeric optimization implementing automatic differentiation on sparse matrix-valued computational graphs, widely used for optimal control and dynamic system simulation.

tools.name: Clawpack
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperbolic PDE system solver package
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to solve hyperbolic systems of partial differential equations, utilizing wave propagation methods to handle shocks and wave interactions effectively.

tools.name: COPASI
tools.one_line_profile: Biochemical network simulation and analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software application for the simulation and analysis of biochemical networks and their dynamics, supporting ODEs, stochastic simulations, and parameter estimation.

tools.name: BASICO
tools.one_line_profile: Simplified Python interface to COPASI
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a simplified and pythonic interface to the COPASI simulator, enabling easy scripting of biochemical network simulations and analysis.

tools.name: Gosl
tools.one_line_profile: Go Scientific Library for linear algebra and differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive scientific computing library for the Go programming language, including modules for linear algebra, FFT, numerical integration, and solvers for ODEs and differential equations.

tools.name: Russell
tools.one_line_profile: Rust Scientific Library for ODE/DAE solving
tools.detailed_description: A scientific library for Rust providing solvers for ordinary differential equations (ODE) and differential-algebraic equations (DAE), along with sparse matrix solvers and special functions.

tools.name: deSolve
tools.one_line_profile: General solvers for initial value problems of ODEs, DAEs, and DDEs
tools.detailed_description: The standard R package for solving initial value problems of differential equations, including Ordinary Differential Equations (ODE), Differential-Algebraic Equations (DAE), and Delay Differential Equations (DDE).

tools.name: dae-cpp
tools.one_line_profile: C++ solver for Differential Algebraic Equations
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, header-only C++ library designed for solving systems of Differential Algebraic Equations (DAEs), offering a simple interface for integration into other applications.

tools.name: Meta.Numerics
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced numerical computing library for .NET
tools.detailed_description: A library for advanced numerical computing on the .NET platform, offering object-oriented APIs for statistical analysis, numerical integration, optimization, and differential equations.

tools.name: numgrid
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration grid generator for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for generating numerical integration grids for molecular simulations, particularly useful in Density Functional Theory (DFT) and other quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: qontrol
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum optimal control library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for quantum optimal control leveraging JAX, Diffrax, and Dynamiqs for efficient simulation and gradient-based optimization of quantum dynamics.

tools.name: SBSCL
tools.one_line_profile: Systems Biology Simulation Core Library
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing efficient implementations for interpreting and simulating models encoded in the Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML), serving as a core engine for systems biology tools.

tools.name: PhyGNNet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed Graph Neural Network for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Physics-informed Graph Neural Networks (PhyGNNet) designed to solve spatiotemporal partial differential equations, combining graph neural networks with physics constraints.

tools.name: torchquad
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated numerical integration library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing numerical integration in arbitrary dimensions on GPUs using PyTorch, TensorFlow, or JAX, enabling high-performance quadrature for scientific computing.

tools.name: Finitewave
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for cardiac electrophysiology modeling using finite-difference methods
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package designed for modeling cardiac electrophysiology tasks. It utilizes finite-difference methods to solve the relevant partial differential equations associated with cardiac wave propagation.

tools.name: Firedrake
tools.one_line_profile: Automated system for solving PDEs using the finite element method
tools.detailed_description: Firedrake is an automated system for the portable solution of partial differential equations using the finite element method (FEM). It allows users to specify equations in a high-level mathematical language and automatically generates optimized code for numerical solution.

tools.name: Flint
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for biological and physiological models supporting PHML and SBML
tools.detailed_description: Flint is a simulator designed for biological and physiological models. It supports standard formats like PHML and SBML, enabling the simulation of complex physiological dynamics and biochemical networks.

tools.name: ParserNG
tools.one_line_profile: Fast math expression parser and evaluator for Java
tools.detailed_description: ParserNG is a powerful math expression parser written in Java. It evaluates math expressions and performs symbolic differential calculus, numerical integration, equation solving, and matrix operations, serving as a computational kernel for scientific applications.

tools.name: Cuba.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library for multidimensional numerical integration in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Cuba.jl provides a Julia interface to the Cuba library for multidimensional numerical integration. It includes four independent algorithms (Vegas, Suave, Divonne, and Cuhre) for deterministic and stochastic integration tasks.

tools.name: hyperSIS
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Gillespie Algorithms for spreading processes on higher-order networks
tools.detailed_description: hyperSIS implements Optimized Gillespie Algorithms (OGA) specifically designed for simulating spreading processes (like SIS models) on higher-order networks (hypergraphs). It is written in Fortran for high-performance stochastic simulation.

tools.name: PhysiBoSS
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale simulation tool combining agent-based and boolean modeling
tools.detailed_description: PhysiBoSS is a tool for multiscale simulation of multi-cellular systems. It integrates Boolean modeling of intracellular signaling (using MaBoSS) with agent-based modeling of cell mechanics and interactions (using PhysiCell).

tools.name: Gridap.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Grid-based approximation of partial differential equations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Gridap.jl is a comprehensive library for the numerical solution of partial differential equations (PDEs) in Julia using grid-based approximation methods, primarily the Finite Element Method (FEM).

tools.name: spreading_CR
tools.one_line_profile: Gillespie algorithm using composition and rejection for spreading processes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Gillespie algorithm optimized with a composition and rejection scheme. It is designed for efficient simulation of spreading processes on complex networks.

tools.name: MorphoDynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for tracking biological cell deformation
tools.detailed_description: MorphoDynamics is a Python package designed for the quantification and tracking of shape deformation in biological cells over time, useful for analyzing cellular dynamics and morphogenesis.

tools.name: PyPDE
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for solving hyperbolic and parabolic PDEs
tools.detailed_description: PyPDE is a Python library for numerically solving systems of hyperbolic or parabolic Partial Differential Equations. It handles stiff source terms and non-conservative components.

tools.name: D-VASim
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Virtual Analyzer and Simulator for genetic logic circuits
tools.detailed_description: D-VASim (Dynamic Virtual Analyzer and Simulator) is a software tool for the simulation and analysis of genetic logic circuit models described in SBML format. It allows users to verify the behavior of synthetic genetic circuits.

tools.name: hmatrix-sundials
tools.one_line_profile: Haskell interface to the Sundials solver suite
tools.detailed_description: hmatrix-sundials provides a Haskell interface to the SUNDIALS (SUite of Nonlinear and DIfferential/ALgebraic equation Solvers) library, enabling high-performance solving of ODEs and DAEs within Haskell applications.

tools.name: odeint-v2
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for solving ordinary differential equations
tools.detailed_description: odeint-v2 is a modern C++ library for solving ordinary differential equations (ODEs). It provides a variety of solvers and is designed for efficiency and flexibility in numerical simulations.

tools.name: spherical-PDE-solver
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral method solver for PDEs on spherical surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A numerical program designed to solve partial differential equations on a spherical surface using spectral methods based on spherical harmonics. Useful for geophysical or biological problems on spherical geometries.

tools.name: PyLPSolve
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the lpsolve linear programming solver
tools.detailed_description: PyLPSolve is an object-oriented Python wrapper for the open-source LP solver `lpsolve`. It integrates with numpy and scipy to provide linear programming capabilities for scientific computing.

tools.name: odespy
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to a collection of ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: odespy offers a unified Python interface to a large collection of ordinary differential equation (ODE) solvers, including those from Fortran libraries (ODEPACK, RADAU5) and Python implementations.

tools.name: PINNacle
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: PINNacle is a comprehensive benchmark codebase for evaluating Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) on various PDE solving tasks. It serves as a tool for comparing different PINN architectures and training strategies.

tools.name: sundialsml
tools.one_line_profile: OCaml interface to the Sundials solver suite
tools.detailed_description: sundialsml provides an OCaml interface to the Sundials suite of numeric solvers, allowing OCaml programs to access high-performance ODE and DAE solvers.

tools.name: stiff3
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive solver for stiff ODE systems
tools.detailed_description: stiff3 is a Fortran implementation of an adaptive solver for stiff systems of ordinary differential equations, utilizing a semi-implicit Runge-Kutta method of third order.

tools.name: Lyapunov
tools.one_line_profile: Library for numerically integrating nonlinear dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the numerical integration of nonlinear dynamical systems, facilitating the analysis of stability and chaos.

tools.name: dop853
tools.one_line_profile: Modern Fortran implementation of the DOP853 ODE solver
tools.detailed_description: A Modern Fortran edition of Hairer's DOP853 ODE solver. It implements an explicit Runge-Kutta method of order 8(5,3) with dense output, suitable for high-precision integration of non-stiff problems.

tools.name: rklib
tools.one_line_profile: Runge-Kutta solvers in Modern Fortran
tools.detailed_description: rklib is a collection of fixed and variable-step Runge-Kutta solvers written in Modern Fortran, providing robust numerical integration capabilities for scientific applications.

tools.name: SimulationLogs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Signal logging and scoping utility for DifferentialEquations.jl
tools.detailed_description: SimulationLogs.jl provides signal logging and scoping functionality for simulations running on the DifferentialEquations.jl ecosystem, facilitating data extraction and monitoring during runtime.

tools.name: CoRC
tools.one_line_profile: High-level R API for the COPASI simulator
tools.detailed_description: CoRC (COPASI R Connector) provides a high-level R API for COPASI, enabling users to run, analyze, and manipulate COPASI biochemical models directly from the R environment.

tools.name: springs-integration-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based numerical integration for mass-spring systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing numerical integration methods for mass-spring systems, leveraging PyTorch's automatic differentiation capabilities for differentiable physics simulations.

tools.name: RK-Opt
tools.one_line_profile: Package for the design and optimization of numerical ODE solvers (Runge-Kutta methods)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package designed for the investigation and optimization of Runge-Kutta methods, specifically focusing on stability and accuracy properties for numerical ODE solving.

tools.name: NodePy
tools.one_line_profile: Software for the analysis and design of initial value ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: NodePy (Numerical ODEs in Python) is a package for designing, analyzing, and testing numerical methods for initial value ODEs, focusing on Runge-Kutta and linear multistep methods.

tools.name: ODE-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: ODE-inspired Transformer model for sequence generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ODE Transformer, a model that redesigns the Transformer architecture from an Ordinary Differential Equation perspective using high-order ODE solvers to enhance residual connections.

tools.name: LibSBMLSim
tools.one_line_profile: Library for simulating biological models in SBML format
tools.detailed_description: A C library dedicated to simulating models encoded in the Systems Biology Markup Language (SBML), supporting various simulation capabilities for systems biology.

tools.name: odex-js
tools.one_line_profile: Bulirsch-Stoer ODE integrator for JavaScript/TypeScript
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript implementation of the Bulirsch-Stoer algorithm for the numerical integration of systems of ordinary differential equations.

tools.name: Chemical Kinetics Calculator
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for Eyring Equation and chemical kinetics
tools.detailed_description: A simple program designed to solve the Eyring Equation and calculate first/second order chemical kinetics parameters.

tools.name: AMPE
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Mesh Phase-field Evolution solver
tools.detailed_description: A C++ code for Adaptive Mesh Phase-field Evolution, developed at LLNL, used for simulating phase-field models with adaptive mesh refinement.

tools.name: pyranda
tools.one_line_profile: Python-driven Fortran solver for hyperbolic PDE systems
tools.detailed_description: A Finite Difference solver for arbitrary hyperbolic PDE systems, featuring a Python interface driving a Fortran backend. It serves as a mini-app for the Miranda code.

tools.name: SUNDIALS
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of nonlinear and differential/algebraic equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: SUNDIALS (SUite of Nonlinear and DIfferential/ALgebraic equation Solvers) is a premier library of solvers for ODEs, DAEs, and nonlinear systems, widely used in scientific computing.

tools.name: ODEInterface.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for Fortran ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing an interface to classic ODE solvers written in Fortran, such as those for non-stiff and stiff systems.

tools.name: PyPLANE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for solving and visualizing systems of ODEs
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python application serving as a replacement for DFIELD and PPLANE, used for solving and visualizing phase planes of ODE systems.

tools.name: DoubleExponentialFormulas.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration using double exponential formulas
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing double exponential (tanh-sinh) quadrature formulas for high-precision 1D numerical integration.

tools.name: libode
tools.one_line_profile: High-order ODE solvers in C++
tools.detailed_description: A dependency-free C++ library providing high-order solvers for ordinary differential equations.

tools.name: findiff
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical derivatives and PDE solver in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating numerical derivatives and solving partial differential equations in any number of dimensions using finite difference methods.

tools.name: torchode
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel ODE solver for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving ordinary differential equations in parallel, designed for high-performance integration within deep learning pipelines.

tools.name: diffsol
tools.one_line_profile: ODE solver library in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A library written in Rust for solving ordinary differential equations, providing efficient numerical integration methods.

tools.name: WaveBEM
tools.one_line_profile: Unsteady Nonlinear Potential Flow Solver
tools.detailed_description: A C++ solver for unsteady nonlinear potential flow, specifically designed for simulating ship-wave interactions using Boundary Element Methods.

tools.name: Math.NET Numerics
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical foundation for scientific computing in .NET
tools.detailed_description: The standard open-source numerical library for .NET, providing methods for linear algebra, calculus, numerical integration, interpolation, and statistics.

tools.name: EconPDEs.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for non-linear HJB equations
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for solving non-linear Hamilton-Jacobi-Bellman (HJB) equations, commonly arising in economic modeling and optimal control.

tools.name: sdeint
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration of Ito or Stratonovich SDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the numerical integration of Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs), supporting both Ito and Stratonovich interpretations.

tools.name: DeepHPMs
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning of Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Deep Hidden Physics Models, a framework for discovering nonlinear partial differential equations from data using deep learning.

tools.name: PINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Physics Informed Deep Learning framework
tools.detailed_description: The reference implementation for Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), enabling data-driven solutions and discovery of nonlinear partial differential equations.

tools.name: qmc
tools.one_line_profile: Quasi-Monte-Carlo Integrator Library with CUDA Support
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for Quasi-Monte-Carlo integration, featuring CUDA support for high-performance parallel computation.

tools.name: Deep-PPDE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning methods for path-dependent PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of deep learning methods to solve path-dependent Partial Differential Equations, often applied in financial mathematics for pricing derivatives.

tools.name: Integrate
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight numerical integration crate for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A small, lightweight Rust crate providing numerical integration algorithms.

tools.name: ProbNumDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Numerical Differential Equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for solving differential equations using probabilistic numerics, specifically via Bayesian filtering and smoothing techniques.

tools.name: graph-pde
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library utilizing graph neural networks to solve partial differential equations, developed by the Neural Operator team.

tools.name: iSINDy
tools.one_line_profile: Implicit SINDy for inferring biological networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the implicit-SINDy algorithm for the sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics, specifically applied to inferring biological networks.

tools.name: wassa
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly Stochastic Simulation Algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Gillespie Stochastic Simulation Algorithm (SSA) compiled to WebAssembly, enabling high-performance stochastic simulations in web environments.

tools.name: PyPartMC
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to PartMC particle-resolved Monte Carlo code
tools.detailed_description: A Python and C++ interface to PartMC, a particle-resolved Monte Carlo code for simulating atmospheric aerosol dynamics and chemistry.

tools.name: Owl ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Differential equation solvers for the Owl scientific computing library
tools.detailed_description: A collection of numerical solvers for ordinary differential equations (ODEs) implemented in OCaml, designed to work within the Owl scientific computing ecosystem.

tools.name: NIntegration.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional numerical integration library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A pure Julia library for performing multidimensional numerical integration, essential for various scientific computing tasks involving complex integrals.

tools.name: NeuralCDE
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Neural Controlled Differential Equations
tools.detailed_description: A library for modeling irregular time series using Neural Controlled Differential Equations (Neural CDEs), offering a continuous-time approach to processing sequential data.

tools.name: diffrax
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical differential equation solvers in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for solving differential equations (ODEs, SDEs, CDEs) in JAX, supporting autodifferentiation, GPU acceleration, and stiff systems.

tools.name: torchcde
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable controlled differential equation solvers for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Provides GPU-supported, memory-efficient solvers for Controlled Differential Equations (CDEs) within the PyTorch framework, suitable for deep learning applications on time series.

tools.name: GHOST
tools.one_line_profile: Geophysical High-Order Suite for Turbulence
tools.detailed_description: A pseudospectral code designed to solve a variety of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) encountered in turbulent flow studies, offering high accuracy and scalability.

tools.name: probdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic solvers for differential equations in JAX
tools.detailed_description: Implements probabilistic numerical methods for solving ODEs in JAX, providing uncertainty quantification alongside the solution trajectory.

tools.name: DGM
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Galerkin Method for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Deep Galerkin Method (DGM) using deep neural networks to solve high-dimensional Partial Differential Equations.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated FEA and Multi-Physics Simulation Platform
tools.detailed_description: A fully integrated Finite Element Analysis (FEA) and multi-physics simulation platform for MATLAB, supporting various solvers like FEniCS, OpenFOAM, and SU2.

tools.name: FLINT
tools.one_line_profile: Fortran Library for numerical INTegration of differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A modern Fortran library providing solvers for systems of ordinary differential equations, focusing on performance and ease of use.

tools.name: sunode
tools.one_line_profile: Fast ODE solver interface for PyMC
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the SUNDIALS ODE solvers, specifically designed to integrate with PyMC for Bayesian inference and probabilistic modeling.

tools.name: pyro2
tools.one_line_profile: Hydrodynamics exploration and prototyping framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for teaching and prototyping hydrodynamics simulations, implementing various PDE solvers for fluid dynamics.

tools.name: SBML_odeSolver
tools.one_line_profile: C library for analyzing ODEs from SBML models
tools.detailed_description: A C library that provides symbolic and numerical analysis capabilities for systems of ODEs derived from chemical reaction networks encoded in SBML.

tools.name: readdy
tools.one_line_profile: Particle-based reaction-diffusion simulator
tools.detailed_description: A software package for simulating particle-based reaction-diffusion systems, useful for modeling cellular processes and biochemical kinetics.

tools.name: PyDSTool
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamical systems modeling and analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A sophisticated Python library for the modeling, simulation, and analysis of dynamical systems, including ODEs, DAEs, and hybrid systems.

tools.name: zombie
tools.one_line_profile: Grid-Free Monte Carlo Solvers for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library implementing grid-free Monte Carlo methods (Walk on Spheres) for solving Partial Differential Equations, suitable for complex geometries.

tools.name: torchdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable ODE solvers for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing differentiable ODE solvers with O(1) memory backpropagation, enabling the integration of ODEs into deep learning models (Neural ODEs).

tools.name: pointcloud-differential
tools.one_line_profile: Differential operators on point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing gradients, divergences, and Laplacians on point clouds, facilitating the solution of PDEs on unstructured data representations.

tools.name: runge-kutta
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Runge-Kutta ODE solver implementation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python implementation of Runge-Kutta methods for solving systems of ordinary differential equations.

tools.name: Galerkin Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Linear attention transformer for solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Galerkin Transformer, a deep learning model designed to solve Partial Differential Equations using a linear attention mechanism.

tools.name: SdePy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical Integration of Ito Stochastic Differential Equations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to the numerical integration of Ito Stochastic Differential Equations (SDEs), providing various schemes for stochastic simulation.

tools.name: Gillespie.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Stochastic Gillespie-type simulations in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for performing stochastic simulations of chemical reaction networks using Gillespie's algorithm.

tools.name: quadpy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integration (quadrature/cubature) in Python
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library for numerical integration (quadrature and cubature) in 1D and higher dimensions, supporting various domains and schemes.

tools.name: ode-solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical methods to solve ODEs in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library implementing various numerical methods for solving ordinary differential equations, providing a performant foundation for scientific computing in Rust.

tools.name: Stan Math Library
tools.one_line_profile: C++ template library for automatic differentiation and probabilistic modeling
tools.detailed_description: The Stan Math Library provides a robust foundation for automatic differentiation (forward, reverse, and mixed modes) and includes a comprehensive suite of functions for probabilistic modeling, linear algebra, and equation solving, serving as the core math engine for the Stan statistical platform.

tools.name: NetPyNE
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale biological neuronal network simulation package
tools.detailed_description: NetPyNE is a Python package designed to facilitate the development, parallel simulation, optimization, and analysis of multiscale biological neuronal networks using the NEURON simulator backend.

tools.name: Tellurium
tools.one_line_profile: Python environment for modeling and simulating biological systems
tools.detailed_description: Tellurium is a Python-based environment for systems biology that integrates libraries for model building (Antimony), simulation (libRoadRunner), and analysis, supporting SBML standards.

tools.name: NumericalIntegration
tools.one_line_profile: C++ header-only library for numerical integration
tools.detailed_description: A precision-independent C++ library providing various numerical integration algorithms (Newton-Cotes, etc.) for scientific computing applications.

tools.name: eom
tools.one_line_profile: Configurable ODE/PDE solver in Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for solving equations of motion (ODE/PDE) with support for various stepping methods (Runge-Kutta, etc.) and data archiving.

tools.name: grid
tools.one_line_profile: Library for numerical operations on molecular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for numerical integration, interpolation, and differentiation specifically on molecular grids, useful in theoretical chemistry and physics.

tools.name: Neural-Solver-Library
tools.one_line_profile: Library for advanced neural PDE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various neural network-based PDE solvers, facilitating the application of AI methods to scientific partial differential equations.

tools.name: Sundial
tools.one_line_profile: Time series foundation models for dynamics forecasting
tools.detailed_description: A family of foundation models for time series analysis, capable of handling diverse forecasting tasks which are critical in analyzing dynamical systems and scientific time-series data.

tools.name: tfdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of ODE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing ordinary differential equation solvers in TensorFlow, enabling gradient propagation through ODE solutions for neural ODE applications.

tools.name: nec2++
tools.one_line_profile: C++ rewrite of the Numerical Electromagnetics Code (NEC-2)
tools.detailed_description: An extensive C++ rewrite of the NEC-2 antenna modeling software, providing a library and executable for analyzing radiating and scattering properties of electromagnetic structures.

tools.name: PhiFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for differentiable simulations of physical phenomena (fluids, etc.) using PDEs, designed to integrate seamlessly with machine learning frameworks like PyTorch and TensorFlow.

tools.name: FiPy
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Volume PDE solver in Python
tools.detailed_description: A partial differential equation solver using the Finite Volume Method (FVM), developed by NIST, suitable for modeling diffusion, convection, and phase field problems.

tools.name: GeneDrive.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for simulating biological dynamics and control
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package specifically designed for modeling and simulating the dynamics of gene drives in biological populations, supporting ecological and evolutionary forecasting.

tools.name: integrator
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical integrator for ODEs in Elixir
tools.detailed_description: A numerical integration library written in Elixir for solving sets of non-stiff ordinary differential equations, providing a functional programming approach to dynamics simulation.

tools.name: RcppNumerical
tools.one_line_profile: Rcpp integration for numerical computing libraries
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to C++ numerical libraries (like L-BFGS-B and numerical integration routines) for high-performance statistical computing in R.

tools.name: py-pde
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for solving PDEs using finite differences
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for solving partial differential equations on grids using finite difference methods, supporting various boundary conditions and differential operators.
